blogPost.excerpt: Porter is a platform that makes AWS/GCP as easy to use as Heroku. With instant deploys from Git, built-in autoscaling, and automatic SSL, Porter gives you the convenience of a PaaS while preserving flexibility and control.
blogPost.body: Porter is a platform that makes AWS/GCP as easy to use as Heroku. With instant deploys from Git, built-in autoscaling, and automatic SSL, Porter gives you the convenience of a PaaS while preserving flexibility and control.
blogPost.title: Porter - Heroku that runs in your own cloud
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Porter是一个让AWS/GCP像Heroku一样容易使用的平台。通过Git的即时部署、内置自动缩放和自动SSL，Porter为您提供了PaaS的便利，同时保留了灵活性和控制力。
Porter是一個讓AWS/GCP像Heroku一樣容易使用的平臺。通過Git的即時部署、內置自動縮放和自動SSL，Porter爲您提供了PaaS的便利，同時保留了靈活性和控制力。

previous.excerpt: Uranus - Wireframe Kit is a Premium wireframing pack with more than 140+ dark/light ready-to-use web elements/sections. The basement idea of this kit was started from the wireframing time problem! 🔥 Will be available in Sketch, Adobe Xd & Code format soon.
previous.title: Uranus v1.2 - Wireframe kit with 140+ modern UI web sections for Figma

localize.description: Uranus - Wireframe Kit是一个高级线框包，包含140多个深色/浅色即用型网络元素/部分。这个套件的创意来自于线框设计的时间问题！🔥即将提供Sketch，Adobe Xd和Code格式。🔥即将推出Sketch、Adobe Xd和Code格式。
localize.tagline: 线框套件，包含140多个现代UI网页部分，适用于Figma。

localize.description: Uranus - Wireframe Kit是一個高級線框包，包含140多個深色/淺色即用型網絡元素/部分。這個套件的創意來自於線框設計的時間問題！🔥即將提供Sketch，Adobe Xd和Code格式。🔥即將推出Sketch、Adobe Xd和Code格式。
localize.tagline: 線框套件，包含140多個現代UI網頁部分，適用於Figma。

next.excerpt: The data management App that gives users ownership and control of their data - Collect your data from multiple platforms - View your data in an intuitive dashboard - Choose who can access your data and who can't
next.title: Rita Personal Data - Collect, view and control your data

localize.description: 数据管理应用程序，让用户拥有和控制他们的数据 - 从多个平台收集您的数据 - 在直观的仪表板中查看您的数据 - 选择谁可以访问您的数据，谁不能。
localize.tagline: 收集、查看和控制您的数据

localize.description: 數據管理應用程序，讓用戶擁有和控制他們的數據 - 從多個平臺收集您的數據 - 在直觀的儀表板中查看您的數據 - 選擇誰可以訪問您的數據，誰不能。
localize.tagline: 收集、查看和控制您的數據
